comments.body: do we want the etcd timeout exactly the same as the rest request or slightly longer so that in the normal case, the rest timeout handler fires first?

I was thinking about that and I think that doesn't really matter. In the code, both timeout and closed channel from the storage layer is treated the same way:
https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/master/staging/src/k8s.io/apiserver/pkg/endpoints/handlers/watch.go#L227
https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/master/staging/src/k8s.io/apiserver/pkg/endpoints/handlers/watch.go#L231

So just for simplicity of thinking, I think that having them equal is easier. WDYT?
If they're treated the same, then I agree it doesn't matter if they're set the same.
